findings.title: Out-of-gas and potential resource exhaustion errors with bulk calls
findings.description: Smart contract owner can allow transfer before trading is enabled, leading to out-of-gas and potential resource exhaustion errors.

findings.title: Out-of-gas and potential resource exhaustion errors with multi wallet blacklist
findings.description: Smart contract owner can blacklist bulk wallets from interacting with the contract function modules, leading to out-of-gas and potential resource exhaustion errors.

findings.title: Typographical Error: Update Liquidity Treshhold
findings.description: Informational severity issue with a typographical error.

findings.title: Bulk Allowed Transfer
findings.description: Smart contract has a low severity issue which may or may not create any functional vulnerability.
